bio.p: Bianca Rosa Ziegler (BHSc) is a master's candidate in the Department of Geography at The University of Western Ontario, London, Ontario, Canada. Her research is focused on maternal health and antenatal care in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and Burundi. Using her background in health sciences and constructs from health geography, she focuses on the timing, access, and utilization of healthcare in the context of fragile and conflict-affected situations and political ecology.
